page.title: 24Music in 2011
page.content:
There is lots of great music in 2011. There arelots of great singers like Bruno Mars, Lil Wayne, Rihanna and many more.

There are lots of festivals. But the most popular in England is Glastonbury. All the best singers and bands go. Thousands of people go.

Some music makes people happy or makes them cry. A lot of people listen to music so they can relax .There are lots of different kinds of music.

There are lots of great bands like The Wanted, JLS, Take that, the Saturdays and The Black Eyed Peas. There are some annoying singers like Justin Bieber and Lady Gaga.

People listen to music on I pods, mp3 player psp's Xbox's, ps3's and computers. People usually download apps from I tunes and computers to get music on their phone.

By Marvin, Louis and Oliver




Class 6 from Gladehill
